paper.name: ClearLag
paper.reason: Plugins that claim to remove lag actually cause more lag.

paper.name: LagAssist
paper.reason:
Should only be used for analytics and preventative measures.
All other features of the plugin should be disabled.

paper.name: NoChunkLag
paper.reason: Plugins that claim to remove lag actually cause more lag.

paper.name: NoMobLag
paper.reason: Plugins that claim to remove lag actually cause more lag.

paper.name: ServerBooster
paper.reason: Plugins that claim to remove lag actually cause more lag.

paper.name: AntiLag
paper.reason: Plugins that claim to remove lag actually cause more lag.

paper.name: BookLimiter
paper.reason: Paper already fixes all crash bugs.

paper.name: FastAsyncWorldEdit
paper.reason: FAWE has some issues, replace it with [WorldEdit](https://enginehub.org/worldedit/#downloads)

paper.name: IllegalStack
paper.reason: Paper already fixes all dupe and crash bugs.

paper.name: ExploitFixer
paper.reason: Paper already fixes all dupe and crash bugs.

paper.name: PhantomSMP
paper.reason: Paper already has its features. You can enable this in paper.yml under the `phantoms-only-attack-insomniacs` option.

purpur.name: VillagerLobotomizatornator
purpur.reason: Purpur already has its features. You can enable this in the purpur.yml under the `villager.lobotomize.enabled` option.
